testimonials.name: Palak
testimonials.content: IIT professors bring unmatched clarity and purpose, their teaching isn't just better, it's built for real understanding.

testimonials.name: Yashasvi Mahavir
testimonials.content: Engineering is common, this minor degree challenged me to think differently, engage deeply, and truly grow beyond the usual.

testimonials.name: Kaushik
testimonials.content: As a BCA graduate, I wanted to stand out this program gives me more than a certificate; it offers real interaction with IIT professors and hands-on IIT experience that sets me apart.

testimonials.name: Mohammed Syed
testimonials.content: Every engineer dreams of IIT, and with Al, DS and ML shaping the future, this opportunity felt like the perfect path to grow and build what's next.

testimonials.name: Bhavana Kumawat
testimonials.content: It was always my dream to study at lIT, A place where learning feels like a privilege and every moment is an opportunity.

testimonials.name: Samantha Julin
testimonials.content: For most Indians, studying at an IIT isn't just a goal, it's a dream shaped by generations.
